clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: SLS is used as a surfactant in shampoos and toothpastes SLS also has microbicidal activities against both enveloped Herpes simplex viruses HIV 1 Semliki Forest virus and nonenveloped papillomaviruses reovirus rotavirus and poliovirus viruses although it has not been approved for this use

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50 Acute 1288 mg kg Rat
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: SLS is an anionic surfactant Its amphiphilic properties make it an ideal detergent
